description.en: A cute, red dragon that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: A cute, red dragon that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Um fofo dragão vermelho que segue seu mestre e recolhe itens caídos.
description.cns: 一只可爱的赤焰小飞龙跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein süßer, roter Drache, der dir folgt und Gegenstände für dich aufhebt.
description.fi: A cute, red dragon that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: A cute, red dragon that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: Un mignon dragon rouge qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets déposés.
description.id: Red Dragon imut yang setia mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: A cute, red dragon that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: レッドドラゴンを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 귀여운 레드 드래곤을 소환 할 수 있습니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: A cute, red dragon that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: A cute, red dragon that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: Миленький красный дракончик, который следует за владельцем и подбирает вещи.
description.sp: Un lindo Dragoncito Rojo que sigue a su dueño recogiendo objetos soltados.
description.sw: A cute, red dragon that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: มังกรแดงน่ารักที่ตามเจ้านายของมันไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 召喚或解除可愛的赤龍。
description.vi: Một con rồng đỏ, dễ thương đi theo chủ nhân của nó và nhặt các vật phẩm bị đánh rơi.
